jakarta.mail.Store

    Package Description
    jakarta.mail
    The Jakarta Mail API provides classes that model a mail system.

      Methods in jakarta.mail that return Store 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Store Folder.getStore()
      Returns the Store that owns this Folder object.
      Store Session.getStore()
      Get a Store object that implements this user's desired Store protocol.
      Store Session.getStore​(Provider provider)
      Get an instance of the store specified by Provider.
      Store Session.getStore​(URLName url)
      Get a Store object for the given URLName.
      Store Session.getStore​(java.lang.String protocol)
      Get a Store object that implements the specified protocol.
      Store StoreClosedException.getStore()
      Returns the dead Store object.

      Constructor Description

      Constructs a StoreClosedException with the specified detail message.
      StoreClosedException​(Store store, java.lang.String message, java.lang.Exception e)
